participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending my free time surfing and learning new things about the ocean.
I'm not super close with my family, but I do enjoy spending time with them.
My ethnicity is not important, but my feet hurt after long runs in my boots.
i work on trucks.
I don't have my own car, but I'm working on it!

participant_2.background:
I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.
I drive a family-friendly SUV that can handle any weather conditions.
i prefer headsets over earbuds.
I enjoy the peace and quiet of the woods when I go hiking on the weekends.
i read fantasy fiction novels.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to hang out with my girlfriend and listen to death metal.
That sounds like fun! I like to surf and learn new things about the ocean.
I've always wanted to try surfing! It looks like a lot of fun.
It is! I would definitely recommend it.
I'll have to try it sometime. What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the feeling of the ocean water and the wind in my hair. It's also really peaceful and relaxing.
That sounds amazing! I can definitely see why you enjoy it so much.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Yeah, I love to read fantasy fiction novels. I also enjoy hiking in the woods.
I love to read too! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to choose just one, but I really enjoyed the Lord of the Rings series.
That's one of my favorites too! I also love the Harry Potter series.
Those are both great books! I'm currently reading The Wheel of Time series.
I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's really long, but it's so good.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'll add it to my list.
No problem! I'm always happy to recommend books.
